column5: Anybody know any killer North Sask River locations for eye's near Edmonton.Thanks.

Well there are lots of great places to fish in the North Saskatchewan river in and around Edmonton. The river is loaded with walleye! Most of the creek mouths will be hot whan the water warms up to spawning temp. Edmonton Parks and Recreation has a river map for the city that is free. Pick it up and you will have some good spots to try. Any more questions? Hope this helps, Chris.
